sourcesContent:
• {{cooking.title}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ICooking } from '../ICooking'; import { CookingService } from '../cooking.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cooking-card', templateUrl: './cooking-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cooking-card.component.css'] }) export class CookingCardComponent implements OnInit { cookings: ICooking[] = []; constructor (private cookingService: CookingService) {} ngOnInit() : void { this.getCookings(); } getCookings(): void { this.cookingService.getAllCookings().subscribe(cookings => this.cookings = cookings); } }
